resources.string: Record your screen and system audio to HD video file! Requires root!

Works only on rooted / jailbroken / unlocked devices!
Don\'t install if your device is not rooted.

Check out SCR Screen Recorder, the Android most comprehensive screencast recording app. SCR Screen Recorder supports all Android versions since 4.0 and utilizes the best encoding method available on each platform. Since the first release in early 2013 SCR Screen Recorder is frequently updated and new features are added regularly.
Unique features:

" • SYSTEM AUDIO - On most devices you can directly record in-game audio without quality loss caused by microphone recording speakers output. The "Internal + Mic" option allows to add a microphone commentary to the system audio recording. At the moment this feature is not available on Android 4.2 but it'll be added soon. "

" • FACE CAM - Share your emotions by adding a front-facing camera to your video. You can move the camera overlay around so that it doesn't obstruct important controls.
• NO ADS - Unlike other \"free\" screen recorders SCR never display any ads. Development of all my apps is supported only by donations and Pro versions.
• SETTINGS - No mater if you prefer to select simple presets or manually tweak every setting we've got you covered. SCR supports many customizations and provides performance and stability stats.
• ALPHA FEATURES - Let us know what's important to you by joining SCR Alpha Testing Google+ community at http://goo.gl/PGYZ8r If you'd like to receive Alpha updates and test brand new features follow the links in the About community section. "
The previous version of this app had over 2 millions downloads and 37k reviews
With SCR Free you can record maximum 3 minutes screencasts and the SCR watermark is added to your video. Buy SCR Pro to get unlimited screencast length with no watermark.
Before you buy consider testing SCR Free to ensure that your device is already supported.

SCR Screen Recorder uses various hacks and unofficial APIs which may not work on some devices and ROMs. If you encounter any issues please report it at scr.screen.recorder@hotmail.com to help me get your device supported.
This app collects anonymous usage statistics to help track bugs and analyze devices compatibility.
This software uses unmodified code of FFmpeg 1.2 licensed under the LGPL.
Lightweight Lollipop screen recorder with cool Face Cam feature. [no root]

" SCR 5+ opens a new chapter in the history of the famous SCR Screen Recorder. Thanks to the new Android 5.0 features SCR 5+ allows to record screen without root access!
Unfortunately Lollipop doesn't natively support internal audio recording yet, so if you require this feature and your device is rooted install SCR Screen Recorder Root. "
Max file size reached. Recording saved to %1$s
To run any screen recorder app your phone/tablet needs to be rooted. There are plenty tutorials on the Internet explaining how to root different devices. Please come back when you are done!

To use full potential of %1$s your device needs to be rooted. Android 5.0 allows basic screen recording without root (no internal audio). Check it out by downloading lightweight %2$s or switching to No-root mode.
If your device is rooted please open %1$s and make sure you haven\'t accidentally denied root access to %2$s.
Tap to request root access and enable all features
The anonymous error report will be sent automatically to help us fix the issue. Feel free to get in touch via support email quoting error SR%1$d.
There is a problem with SELinux configuration on your device. Make sure your device is properly rooted and switch SELinux to permissive mode if possible.

Try changing resolution or switching image transformation between GPU/CPU. Please uninstall other screencast applications if you have any. If the problem persists please get in touch via support email quoting error R%1$d.

Try reducing resolution or video bitrate. Note that on some devices portrait video orientation works only with lower resolutions. If the problem persists please get in touch via support email quoting error R%1$d.
SCR was unable to create %1$s video file. Make sure that selected output directory is writable and that SD Card is not locked by USB connection.
Only one app can use microphone at a time. This is an Android system limitation. Close other app using the microphone (e.g. Google Now or Skype) or continue recording without audio.
The screen can\’t be captured because some app marked the screen content as secure.
Your graphic card is not supported yet. Switch Image transformation setting to CPU or use software video encoder.
Unsupported audio configuration. Try changing SCR audio settings.
Your Android version is not supported yet.
Your CPU architecture (%1$s) is not supported by %2$s.
Can\'t install required files. Make sure you have some free space on your device and restart %1$s.
Buy SCR Screen Recorder Pro to get unlimited recording time and no watermark on the video.
Buy SCR Screen Recorder Pro to hide watermark and notification icon. You\'ll get unlimited recording time as well!
Please search for SCR Screen Recorder Pro in Google Play
Up to %1$dfps, limited by hardware capabilities

By default video frames are always horizontal and rotation metadata is added to the portrait recordings. YouTube and default Android video player plays such videos correctly but some PC players (e.g. VLC) ignore rotation metadata and display it in landscape mode. You can enable Vertical frames below but use this option with caution as many devices can\’t record/play videos with Vertical frames.

Video players on many devices can\'t play videos with vertical frames. Even if this option is unselected orientation metadata is added to the video so that it\'s displayed correctly in default Android player, YouTube etc.
Use wired headphones to avoid echo
Not compatible with your audio driver
Show visual feedback for touches. Enable permanently through Android Settings→Developer Options→Show touches
Finish recording after the screen is turned off
Toggle this option if blue and red colors are inverted
Select if the recording contains random colourful stripes
Available only with CPU Image transformation
Couldn\'t download recommended settings. Make sure you\'re online.
Directory can\'t be created. Make sure to choose a writable location e.g. SD Card.
The application doesn\'t seem to have write permission to %1$s directory. This may cause recording issues.
The attachment contains detailed system log including information about an error. Feel free to add any comments here.
If you enjoy using %1$s, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
To stop recording lock the screen and wait 2 seconds. Alternatively you can simply reopen %1$s app.
Buy SCR Pro now and save %1$d %%! This offer ends on %2$s.
By using %1$s you agree that you are solely responsible for ensuring you do not violate third party copyright or other intellectual property rights.
Can\'t enable internal audio. Please send a bug report to help me get your device supported. Audio source will be set to %1$s.
Internal audio stability issue detected. Please send a bug report to help me get your device supported. Audio source will be set to %1$s.
Internal audio recording is switched off because %1$s didn\'t shut down correctly. You can re-enable it in Settings.
Error verifying license. Please purchase SCR Pro through Google Play Store. If you have Lucky Patcher installed please disable Google Play emulation.

Error verifying license. Make sure your internet connection is up, date and time is correct on your device and your\'re logged into Google Play Store. After the license is verified you can continue using SCR Pro offline.

Error verifying license. Make sure you installed SCR Pro though Google Play and that date and time is correct on your device. If the problem persists clear data and cache of \"Google Play services\" and \"Google Play Store\" apps.
There is a problem with root access on your device. Please open %1$s and make sure you haven\'t accidentally denied root access to %2$s.
Camera image on top of recording
If you can\'t see %1$s floating window go to MiUi apps settings and enable \"Show popup windows\" for %1$s.
You need to tap START NOW for recording to work.

" Audio driver installation on your device requires modifications to the system partition. In the unlikely event of installation error your device may get soft-bricked or enter boot loop. Please make sure you know how to re-flash system partition or restore system from backup before proceeding. If you decide to uninstall %1$s in the future open SCR Settings and disable internal audio before uninstalling the app.
I know how to restore system partition
Please install latest %1$s from Google Play

"If you experience System UI crash after starting %1$s please reinstall this application and don't select \"%2$s\" checkbox on the screen capture permission dialog. This is a system bug which can't be fixed by %1$s."
"Don't select \"%1$s\" checkbox to avoid system crashes"
Get the new Gusher app and broadcast your screen live to Twitch or YouTube.
Broadcast live to Twitch, YouTube or other streaming service
Simply repair recordings corrupted by camera crash or dead battery
